Is there a way to give an album more than five stars!? If so, Once deserves it. Nightwishs previous album Century Child has long been a favorite of mine. Once is a step above that. The album has more of a metal edge to it than Child as well as using the orchestra more. The entire album is a highlight, if youre a Nightwish fan youre sure to appreciate the growth they have undergone between Century Child and now. If you like metal mixed with a symphony you will love Once!! --Allen Chapman
